name: TURK: The Demon Slayer
description:
TURK: The Demon Slayer - is an absolutely new and unusual 3D shooter with surviving elements where you have to fight to different evil spirits playing as Turk, the church messenger.

The title of the game speaks for itself. Here you will have to clear large locations which are full of evil spirits, collect keys to open for moving to new levels and, of course, to collect the whole ammos that you will be able to find. The endless number of swamp monsters, ghosts and minotaurs will be on your way.
Every of them has a various amount of damage and health points. But don’t rush to give up. In your arsenal there will be various weapons that will help to handle any monsters. A crossbow, a flamethrower and a magic book will be with you during the game. Be sure – TURK: The Demon Slayer, will leave a good impression!
